title: Deployer duty: monitor operation; suspend on risk; inform provider/distributor/MSA; serious incident notification

article_refs.quote: Deployers shall monitor the operation ... inform providers ... suspend the use ... inform ... of that incident ... Article 73 shall apply mutatis mutandis.

legal_consequence.verbatim: Deployers shall monitor the operation of the high-risk AI system on the basis of the instructions for use and, where relevant, inform providers in accordance with Article 72. Where deployers have reason to consider that the use of the high-risk AI system in accordance with the instructions may result in that AI system presenting a risk within the meaning of Article 79(1), they shall, without undue delay, inform the provider or distributor and the relevant market surveillance authority, and shall suspend the use of that system. Where deployers have identified a serious incident, they shall also immediately inform first the provider, and then the importer or distributor and the relevant market surveillance authorities of that incident. If the deployer is not able to reach the provider, Article 73 shall apply mutatis mutandis.

items.label: Financial institutions deeming clause
items.text: For financial institutions, the monitoring obligation is deemed fulfilled by complying with sectoral internal governance rules.

items.label: Penalty (Art. 99)
items.text: Obligation/requirement; fines up to EUR 15,000,000 or 3% turnover may apply.
